About Me

Who am I?

I design and build high-performance software across web, desktop, and embedded platforms. My work spans ASP.NET and React-based web systems, C++/Qt Quick applications, and service-oriented architectures with CI/CD automation. I focus on scalability, performance, and maintainability—combining academic research with real-world engineering to ship reliable systems.

My Resume

Experienced Qt Quick (QML) Developer with a strong background in designing and implementing modern, responsive, and user-friendly interfaces across desktop and embedded platforms. Skilled in integrating C++ with QML, optimizing performance, and managing complex UI architectures such as dynamic SplitViews, model-view patterns, and state management.

Also .NET Developer and skilled in modern web technologies including JS and React.js. Currently pursuing a PhD at AGH University, with a strong foundation in research, software design, and user experience optimization.
